# UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle.automatic

**Case**

The default background style, which adapts in response to changes in the page control’s interaction state.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle.prominent**: The background style that shows a full background regardless of the interaction.
- **UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle.minimal**: The background style that shows a minimal background regardless of the interaction.

items.description: The background style that shows a full background regardless of the interaction.
items.name: UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle.prominent

items.description: The background style that shows a minimal background regardless of the interaction.
items.name: UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle.minimal
